title: In Low Priority Queue Last 9 Games
body:
Good Morning Legends,

I want to follow up on my account that I have been in Low Priority Queue in the last 9 Games. Please check your system as the term and conditions state that only after 5 Games it will be banished, It looks like the conditions are not correct. 

**Go through my match history system, you can see that I have played 3 games in recent days while I was inactive for about a couple of months - Due to the inactivity is that after the 5th game onto the 6th, I still receive the time penalties till after 9 games. **

Please resolve this issue.

Regards,
**Nik**

replies.body:
Good Afternoon Legends,

After the 11th game, my ban has been removed, I am wanting a compensation for Misleading Term & Conditions to Players. (For the queues - 5 Games and low priority queue is equal 1 hour)

Single Low Priority Queue is 20 Minutes and the maximum is 1 Hour (5 Low Priority Queue). 

11 Low Priority Queue is equal to 2 Hours and 20 Minutes. I am wanting a fair compensation!

Please respond Moderator.

Regards,
Nik
Are you sure it was a 5 game LPQ and not a 10 or 20 game LPQ?
LPQs are always 5 games, but if you trigger LB again while on your LPQ it'll reset the count.
Ahaha that would make more sense true :P It happens to all of us at some point :)

Thank you guys for responding to my discussion. However, i have not ever AFK or Leave a game during this ban. The LPQ states that it for 5 Games Only.

P.S I just when and played another game - Now my 10th and still ongoing ban for the 11th.

Big help appreciate!

Regards,
Nik
Or did you afk/leave a game on low pri? that will reset the count
